The TzTok slayer helmet (i) is a piece of equipment that is worn in the helmet slot. It is a cosmetic upgrade to the slayer helmet (i), styled after TzTok-Jad.

It can be created by speaking to Ghommal after completing the elite Combat Achievements. This is reversible, and the slayer helmet's components will be returned to the inventory.

The '''TzTok slayer helmet (i)''' is a piece of equipment that is worn in the helmet slot. It is a cosmetic upgrade to the [[slayer helmet (i)]], styled after [[TzTok-Jad]].

It can be created by speaking to [[Ghommal]] after completing the [[elite Combat Achievements]]. This is reversible, and the slayer helmet's components will be returned to the inventory.
